title: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Mesh Athletic Basketball Shorts Quick Dry Activewear with Pockets
description: Designed for Comfort and Performance: Our Men's Mesh Athletic Shorts are made with a breathable and moisture-wicking fabric that keeps you cool and dry during any activity. With an adjustable drawstring waist and a comfortable fit, these shorts are perfect for any workout or athletic event, like a basketball game or running.

Enjoy Versatility and Convenience: With our 5-pack of Men's Mesh Shorts, you can enjoy the benefits of having multiple pairs of high-quality shorts at an affordable price. These shorts are perfect for any activity, from basketball and soccer to running and fitness. Plus, with pockets included, you can carry your essentials with you wherever you go.

Features You'll Love: Our Men's Mesh Shorts feature a quick-dry fabric that ensures you stay dry and comfortable all day long. These shorts also have a stretchy and loose 9-inch inseam design that provides maximum range of motion and flexibility. Plus, the variety of colors allows you to mix and match with any shirt or athletic gear.

A Great Gift Idea: Looking for the perfect gift for the sporty man in your life? Our 5-pack of Men's Mesh Shorts is an excellent choice. With a variety of colors and sizes to choose from, these shorts make a practical and stylish gift for any occasion.

Real Essentials' Commitment to the Family: At Real Essentials, we believe in providing high-quality clothing options for hard-working families at an affordable price. Our 5-pack of Men's Mesh Shorts takes your dollar further, giving you multiple options for any activity. Whether you're hitting the gym or just lounging around, our Men's Mesh Shorts are the perfect addition to your activewear collection.
